title: Course for Improving Basic Mathematics Skills for Working Professionals Through Computer-Assisted Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary-Level Understanding of Basic Arithmetic Operations
context.additional_context: A course focused on strengthening foundational math competencies for workplace performance improvement, providing a highly accessible learning environment based on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can perform fractional operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners can actively utilize computer-assisted tools for mathematical problem-solving.
Learners can improve their positive attitude index toward mathematics (based on the ARC model) by at least 15%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
